dalamenee-banshee-squadron-halo-legends.name: Banshee Squadron
dalamenee-banshee-squadron-halo-legends.ability: Friendly squadrons with SWARM at distance 1 may reroll 1 blank red dice.

cx2-cx-dagger-vessel-legends.author: ForestEXE
cx2-cx-dagger-vessel-legends.name: CX Dagger Vessel
cx2-cx-dagger-vessel-legends.ability: When attacking a squadron, if you are at distance 1 of only one enemy squadron and no other squadrons, you may change 1 die to any face not already in the attack pool.

author: Cpt Qirk
deathrain-tie-punisher-squadron-legends.name: TIE Punisher Squadron
deathrain-tie-punisher-squadron-legends.ability: After your activation, you may suffer 2 damage to drop 1 proximity mine at range 1.

author: Cpt Qirk
redline-tie-punisher-squadron-legends.name: TIE Punisher Squadron
redline-tie-punisher-squadron-legends.ability: While you perform an attack against a ship, you may reroll any of your attack dice.

author: Arslanxelan
vynder-xg1-starwing-squadron-legends.name: XG-1 Star Wing Squadron
vynder-xg1-starwing-squadron-legends.ability: While you are engaged with multiple squadrons, attacks against you are treated as obstructed.

author: Arslanxelan
karsabi-xg1-starwing-squadron-legends.name: XG-1 Star Wing Squadron
karsabi-xg1-starwing-squadron-legends.ability:
While attacking a ship, if there is at least 1 friendly unengaged squadron at distance 1 of you with the Bomber keyword, you may add a red die to the attack pool.
When attacking a ship, for each other friendly unengaged squadron with the Bomber keyword at distance 1 of you, you may reroll one die.

knife26-longsword-halo-legends.name: longsword-fighter-squadron
knife26-longsword-halo-legends.ability: While attacking a non-unique squadron, each of your red :hit: icons adds 1 damage to the total.
